puzzle.answer: SUPPLIERS
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SUPPLIERS {SID,NAME}
SELECT sid,name FROM suppliers;
SELECT sid,name, city FROM suppliers;
SUPPLIERS {SID,NAME,CITY}
SELECT distinct city from suppliers;
SUPPLIERS {CITY}
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE status >=15 AND status <=25;
SUPPLIERS WHERE STATUS <=25 AND STATUS >=15
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE city IN ('Athens','London');
SUPPLIERS WHERE CITY ="London" OR CITY = "Athens"
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE city NOT IN ('Athens','London');
SUPPLIERS WHERE NOT (CITY='London') AND NOT (CITY='Athens')
SELECT sid FROM suppliers WHERE city='London';
SUPPLIERS{SID} where CITY='London'
SELECT sid FROM shipments WHERE pid='P1';
SHIPMENTS{SID} where PID=P#('P1')
SELECT count(sid) as c FROM shipments;
COUNT (SHIPMENTS)
SELECT count(sid) as c FROM shipments WHERE sid='S1';
COUNT((SHIPMENTS WHERE SID=S#('S1')) {PID})
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE sid IN (SELECT sid FROM shipments);
SUPPLIERS JOIN SHIPMENTS{SID}
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE sid NOT IN (SELECT sid FROM shipments);
SUPPLIERS NOT MATCHING (SUPPLIERS JOIN (SHIPMENTS {SID}))
SELECT S.sid, S.name, SH.pid, P.name, SH.qty FROM suppliers S, shipments SH, parts P WHERE s.sid=SH.sid AND P.pid=SH.pid;
SHIPMENTS JOIN (SUPPLIERS rename {NAME as SNAME}){SID,SNAME} JOIN (PARTS rename {NAME as PNAME}){PID,PNAME}
SELECT sum(SH.qty) FROM suppliers S, shipments SH, parts P WHERE s.sid='S1' AND s.sid=SH.sid AND P.pid=SH.pid;
SUM(SHIPMENTS WHERE (SID=S#('S1')), QTY)
SELECT SH.pid FROM suppliers S, shipments SH, parts P WHERE s.sid=SH.sid AND P.pid=SH.pid AND S.city='Paris';
((SHIPMENTS JOIN SUPPLIERS) WHERE CITY = 'Paris') {PID}
SELECT s.city FROM suppliers s GROUP BY s.city HAVING COUNT(*)>=2;
((SUMMARIZE SUPPLIERS BY {CITY}:{SUPPLIERSUM:=COUNT()}) WHERE SUPPLIERSUM >=2) {CITY}
SELECT * from suppliers WHERE city IN (SELECT city FROM suppliers ORDER BY city LIMIT 1);
SUPPLIERS where CITY=MIN(SUPPLIERS,CITY)
SELECT sid, sum(qty) FROM shipments GROUP BY sid;
SUMMARIZE SHIPMENTS BY {SID}:{TOTAL:=SUM(QTY)}
SELECT * FROM parts WHERE weight IN (SELECT weight FROM parts ORDER BY weight LIMIT 1);
PARTS WHERE WEIGHT=MIN(PARTS,WEIGHT)
SELECT distinct pid FROM shipments WHERE pid NOT IN(SELECT distinct pid from shipments WHERE sid NOT IN (SELECT sid FROM suppliers WHERE city NOT IN ('Paris')));
(SHIPMENTS not matching (SUPPLIERS where CITY='Paris'))
SELECT sid FROM suppliers WHERE sid IN (SELECT sid from shipments GROUP BY sid HAVING count(pid)>= (SELECT count(pid) FROM parts));
(SUMMARIZE SHIPMENTS PER (SUPPLIERS{SID}):{Supp:=COUNT()}) WHERE Supp=COUNT(PARTS)
SELECT sid,name fROM suppliers WHERE status <(SELECT status FROM suppliers WHERE sid='S1');
SUPPLIERS WHERE STATUS <(SUM(SUPPLIERS where SID=S#('S1'),STATUS))
SELECT sid,pid FROM SUPPLIERS,PARTS WHERE (pid,sid) NOT IN (SELECT pid,sid FROM SHIPMENTS);
(SUPPLIERS{SID} JOIN PARTS{PID}) not matching SHIPMENTS{PID,SID}

SELECT city, sum(ps) AS ps, sum(ss) AS ss, sum(total) as total FROM (SELECT city, 0 AS ps, count(sid) AS ss, 0 as total FROM suppliers GROUP BY city UNION SELECT city, count(pid) AS ps , 0 AS ss, 0 as total FROM parts GROUP BY city UNION SELECT city, 0 as ps, 0 as ss,sum(qty) AS total from shipments S, suppliers SU WHERE S.sid=SU.sid GROUP BY city) AS TMP GROUP BY city;

(SUMMARIZE (extend (SUMMARIZE SUPPLIERS per (SUPPLIERS{CITY}): {SS:=count()}): { PS:=0, TOTAL:=0} ) UNION (EXTEND (SUMMARIZE PARTS per (PARTS{CITY}): {PS:=count()}) : {SS:=0, TOTAL:=0}) UNION (EXTEND (SUMMARIZE (SUPPLIERS JOIN SHIPMENTS) per (SUPPLIERS{CITY}) : { TOTAL:= sum(QTY)}) : {SS:=0,PS:=0}) per (SUPPLIERS{CITY} UNION PARTS{CITY}) : { SS:=sum(SS), PS:=sum(PS), TOTAL:=sum(TOTAL)}){CITY,PS,SS,TOTAL}
SELECT * from parts ORDER BY weight DESC,pid ASC LIMIT 1;
(PARTS where PID = MIN(PARTS where WEIGHT=MAX(PARTS,WEIGHT), PID)){PID}
SELECT city, avg(status) AS avg_status FROM suppliers WHERE city IN (SELECT distinct city from parts) GROUP BY city;
(SUMMARIZE SUPPLIERS PER (SUPPLIERS{CITY}):{avg_status:=avg(STATUS)}) MATCHING PARTS{CITY}

SELECT pid FROM (SELECT count(*), pid FROM (SELECT sid , pid FROM shipments WHERE sid IN (SELECT sid from suppliers WHERE city IN ('London'))) AS tmp GROUP BY pid) AS final WHERE count = (SELECT count(*) FROM suppliers WHERE city IN ('London'));
((SHIPMENTS RENAME {PID AS p}) JOIN (SHIPMENTS RENAME {PID AS q}) WHERE p <> q){p,q}
SELECT sid, sum(qty) FROM shipments GROUP BY sid HAVING SUM(qty) >= ANY (SELECT sum(qty) from shipments GROUP BY sid ORDER BY sum DESC LIMIT 3);
